alert.note: Alert for Kemper; Neshoba (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued July 21 at 9:08PM CDT until July 21 at 11:00PM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1000 PM CDT FOR NORTHERN NEWTON...SOUTHWESTERN KEMPER...SOUTHERN NESHOBA AND NORTHERN LAUDERDALE COUNTIES... At 907 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Herbert Springs, or 14 miles southeast of Philadelphia, moving southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. This severe storm will be near... Damascus and Duffee around 920 PM CDT. Liberty and Martin around 930 PM CDT. Prismatic around 940 PM CDT. Blackwater around 945 PM CDT. Daleville around 950 PM CDT. Meridian Station around 1005 PM CDT. Marion around 1010 PM CDT. Lauderdale around 1020 PM CDT. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Continuous cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Move indoors immediately. Lightning is one of nature`s leading killers. Remember, if you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning.
